name: Production Picking List
query:
SELECT
    pp.name AS "Production Plan:Link/Production Plan:120",

    -- Finished Product Info
    ppi.item_code AS "Finished Product:Link/Item:150",
    ppi.planned_qty AS "Planned Qty:Float:100",
    ppi.stock_uom AS "Finished Product UOM:Link/UOM:80",
    ppi.warehouse AS "Finished Goods Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:180",

    -- Component Info
    bei.item_code AS "Component Item:Link/Item:150",
    bei.stock_qty AS "Per BOM Qty:Float:80",
    bom.quantity AS "BOM Qty:Float:80",
    (bei.stock_qty * ppi.planned_qty / bom.quantity) AS "Required Qty:Float:120",
    bei.stock_uom AS "Component UOM:Link/UOM:80",

    -- Component Source Warehouse
    COALESCE(id_item.default_warehouse, id_group.default_warehouse) AS "Component Source Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:180"

FROM
    `tabProduction Plan` pp
JOIN
    `tabProduction Plan Item` ppi ON ppi.parent = pp.name
JOIN
    `tabBOM` bom ON bom.name = ppi.bom_no
JOIN
    `tabBOM Explosion Item` bei ON bei.parent = bom.name
LEFT JOIN
    `tabItem` item ON item.name = bei.item_code
LEFT JOIN
    `tabItem Default` id_item ON id_item.parent = bei.item_code AND id_item.parenttype = 'Item'
LEFT JOIN
    `tabItem Default` id_group ON id_group.parent = item.item_group AND id_group.parenttype = 'Item Group'

WHERE
    pp.docstatus = 1
    AND pp.name = %(production_plan_id)s

ORDER BY
    pp.name,
    ppi.item_code,
    bei.item_code;
